right foot we will continue without ending off we will work a foundation double crochet fdc stitch to make the strap if you are unfamiliar with the fdc there are some great video tutorials online 1 yarn over and insert hook into the eye of the last star yarn over and draw through 3 loops on hook 2 yarn over draw through one loop yarn over draw through two loops yarn over draw through the last two loops your first fdc is complete 3 work 6 fdc stitches 7fdc 4 chain 4 and slip_stitch into the base of the last fdc to make a loop for the button to be placed through end off if you have a larger button work an extra chain to make the loop bigger 8 making the heel strap left foot for the left shoe end off after row 5 of the making the heel section of the pattern this strap is made separately 1 chain 4 make your first foundation double_crochet fdc make another 6fdc leaving a tail long enough to sew to the heel of the shoe 2 attach the strap to the right side of the heel with a slip_stitch into the top of the single_crochet from row 5 use a yarn needle to attach the bottom of the strap to the side of the heel 3 the side that has the chain 4 in the first fdc will become the button hole
